title: Wick

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Set up a trail of rope between three targets' houses. Tonight, if the first target visits the second and the second target visits the third, douse all three targets. You'll be told if you're successful. Cannot self-target.
- Redirect a doused player. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You're redirect immune.
- You only visit your first target. If you would successfully douse, your visit becomes Astral. 
- You may multitask, though this does not apply to the factional douse.
- At any time, if there is no Apocalypse, you will become the Apocalypse.

desc:
Post 2376
*It's fun to watch. They fall like dominoes!*
